code: import React,{useState}from'react';import'./card.css';import CardFilter from'./CardFilter';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Cards(card){const[filter,setFilter]=useState('Today');const handleFilterChange=filter=>{setFilter(filter);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"col-xxl-4 col-md-6",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card info-card sales-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CardFilter,{filterChange:handleFilterChange}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card-body",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h5",{className:"card-title",children:[card.card.name," ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:filter})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"d-flex align-item-center",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"card-icon rounded-circle d-flex align-item-center justify-content-center",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:card.card.icon})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"ps-3",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h6",{children:card.card.name=="Revenue"?'$'+card.card.amount.toLocaleString('en-us'):card.card.amount.toLocaleString('en-us')}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:`${card.card.percentage>0?'text-success':'text-danger'} small pt-1 fw-bold`,children:[card.card.percentage>0?card.card.percentage*100:-card.card.percentage*100,"%"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"text-muted small pt-2 ps-1",children:card.card.percentage>0?'increase':'decrese'})]})]})]})]})});}export default Cards;
